duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage technical functions, activities, and operations of the MRI modality across multiple locations.
Prioritize overall activities, delegate work, and ensure appropriate staffing needs at all times.
Responsible for hiring, onboarding, training, mentorship, and performance management of technologists.
Monitor staff compliance with department and regulatory standards and ensure patient safety.
Assist Radiologists in developing new procedure protocols and ensure MR safety standards.
Coordinate installation and security of IT resources and troubleshoot problems concerning information systems.
Develop QA improvements based on continuous analysis of operations, policies, and procedures to ensure quality service.
Review policies and procedures, ensure compliance, and prepare quality assessment reports.
Coordinate activities with IT resources for installation and security, ACR Accreditation applications, and image submission.
Lead training and educational activities for all sites, and travel as required.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of a 2-year AMA approved Radiology school and at least 4 years of related experience, New York State Licensed X-Ray Technologist by the Department of Health, Registered X-Ray Technologist by American Registry of Radiologic Technologists (ARRT), ARRT/MRI certification, 2 years supervisory experience.
